nodes.text: What is the Department doing to research that and to find out what the direct link is and what joint work is being done by his Department and the Department of Health to ensure that people are protected?
within a radius of 2 km from a hazardous waste site recorded birth defects are 7 per cent. higher than in the rest of the population.
The hazardous waste site is likely to cause bird defects
I have some personal interest in that question as I live within 1 km of such a site
If we want to solve this problem we have to doing research on it
